operator: C & M Aircraft Parts & Salvage Company
circumstances: While completing a low pass, the twin engine airplane struck trees and crashed. The aircraft was destroyed and both occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Collision with trees during a low pass after the pilot misjudged altitude and clearance. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Unwarranted low flying, 
- High obstructions,
- Forced landing off airport on land, 
- Bale of marijuana found along flight path in open field.
